name: Saint Heart
introduction: Saint Heart is a multi-talented entertainer who has been taking the entertainment industry by storm since she moved to Los Angeles, California. She broke into the music scene when she was signed to Universal Music Group, and has since toured in 12 states and graced the cover of several magazines and has attended The Grammys multiple times. Her music is available online, giving her listeners access to her creative sound across the world. Even during the pandemic, Saint Heart didn't let anything stop her she discovered a passion for acting and booked her first lead role in Panic with a release date of summer 2023. Recently, Saint Heart had the incredible opportunity to work on Alien Storm alongside movie stars such as Kevin Sorbo from Hercules and Tom Arnold from True Lies. This further confirms what Saint Heart always knew: that she was born to be an entertainer and an international success. With unwavering determination, ambition and talent, she continues to persevere on her path towards stardom and nothing will get in her way!
